entry.title: Samsung Galaxy S7 Rear Camera Flex
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck
Type: Small Parts
Price: 15.99 - 19.99 (2 variants)

Description

This Samsung Galaxy S7 Rear Camera Flex is designed to allow the replacement of your broken Back Camera. 

Notice

Sony Hero is for the following models : S7 G930V

ISOCELL S5K2L1 is for the following models :  S7 G930U, G930P, G930A and G930T

Warranty

Unlockr offers a 1 year on this item. Our warranty does not cover physical damage caused by the technician or any other reason. Please see our full warranty and returns policy for extra details.

Part Type Samsung Rear-Facing Camera
Compatible Model Galaxy S7 (5.1")
Model Number G930W8 / G930V / G930U / G930P / G930A / G930T
Manufacturer Unlockr
Warranty 1 Year Warranty
